text:
Jumping in here because I’m really not sure what’s going on :thinking_face:

I have two stylesheets I want to add to every template, but they aren’t being loaded :confused:

When I do a search through the `combined-css.css` file on any page, none of the classes that are in `_wt-utilities.css` or `_wt-shame.css` are there. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Am I missing another step?
Glad to see a shame file ;)
Got rid of the underscores just to see if that mattered — but it didn’t :cry:
Howdy folks, quick question. Do media queries work in the CSS section when editing a custom module, or would I have to add them to the page/stylesheet?
<@UEKGSE5JN> they work exactly as you’d expect them to
That doesn’t seem to be the case right now. :disappointed:  Maybe I’m doing something wrong.
copy and paste your code snippet maybe we can help
did you mean to use `max-device-width` or instead `max-width`?(dumb question i know, just trying to confirm your intent)
Oh shoot. :faceplam:  Nope, good question and right answer. Thank you!
